text: Arun Singh may refer to: *Arun Singh (cricketer) (born 1975), Indian cricketer *Arun Singh (politician, born 1944), Indian politician and union minister of state for defence in the Government of India *Arun Singh (politician, born 1965), National General Secretary of the Bharatiya Janata Party of India from 2015 *Arun Kumar Singh, Indian Ambassador to the United States (2015–2016)
title: Arun Singh
